attributes.action: Tell people how racist the BNP are!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BNP is a racist party it is blantanly obvious isn't it time we got rid of the new MEP Andrew Brons who in reality got elected becuase people were angry at your Government for allowing claims on moats to hob nobs.

I hope Prime Minister you will sign this petition also.
